evidence.claim: Esperta Health utilizes AWS services including Lambda for serverless architecture and S3 for storage solutions.
The platform emphasizes adherence to FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
They support EDI transactions, specifically HIPAA-compliant X12 transactions, for billing and claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Esperta Health aligns with API-first healthcare data exchange and uses X12 transactions.
